snippet.title: Vampire Slayer VI Team Deathmatch Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay video for the Half-Life mod Vampire Slayer, playing as, well, vampires and slayers. 

IMO, I fell the vampires are overpowered, with their one (occasionally 2) hit kill attack and resurrection (though it's not to the level of Vampire Rain overpowered, thankfully). Maybe make a two to three hit kill attack. 

The gameplay footage here is under team deathmatch settings. The default gameplay rules for Vampire Slayer is more Counter-Strike style, with no respawning until the end of a round. But unfortunately, the bots pretty incompetent at just walking around, so it takes forever for a round to end.

Speaking about bots, you'll see some bot stupidity in this video, especially how slayer bots forget to stab a  vampire's heart with a stake, so the vampire keeps on resurrecting.

Download mod here:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/vampire-slayer

A Source engine version of this mod called Dead of the Night is being developed. More information here: http://www.donmod.com/index.php

#CountChocula
